A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I absolutely loved The Last Jedi. The story progressed beyond nostalgia for the original trilogy and really challenged the characters in ways I didn't see coming. It's hard not to think a lot of these low star reviews are shady\, most of them have never reviewed another movie on this site and they spew out vague complaints that clearly don't hold any weight or sense of reality. It's also hard to talk about this movie without spoiling it\, so what I'll keep my thoughts to the point. I loved the surprises\, the action set pieces\, the acting (especially Adam Driver and Mark Hamill)\, and the visuals. The humor was lighter than Force Awakens and there were a handful of plot threads that were a little slow for me. But man oh man\, the last 45 minutes is peak Star Wars and I loved it so much!
